NO_PROFILE_SELF: {{author}} You don't have a `Profile` yet. Use the command `{{prefix}}profileconfig` to generate one
PC_INTRO:
<:_:979009081325019156> **Introduction**: Set an introductionary message
<:_:979009081325019156> **Favorite Character**: Select your favorite character
<:_:979009081325019156> **Display Card**: Choose a card to be displayed on your profile
<:_:979009081325019156> **Background**: Set a background for your profile
<:_:979009081325019156> **Font Color**: Change your profile's text color
<:_:979009081325019156> **Profile Glow**: Apply a glowing effect to your profile
<:_:979009081325019156> **Awards**: Display awards on your profile
TYPE_FAV_CHAR: Enter the name of your favorite character
PROVIDE_FAV_CC: Enter the code of the card you want to display on your profile
NON_TRADABLE_NOTE: The above backgrounds are not considered to be `Items` and are thus not tradeable and will override your existing background image
NEED_MIN_AWARDS: You need a minimum of **6** awards in order to use this option
SHOWING_ACHS: Here is a list of your achievements:
PROVIDE_ACH_ID: Achievement badges are displayed from left to right, input their numbers accordingly
SET_FC_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to set **{{character}}** from **{{series}}** as your favorite character?
CANNOT_SET_PBG: You have an insufficient amount of `Silver` to buy this profile background
PROVIDE_PBG_ID: {{author}} Please enter a profile background ID
NON_TRADABLE_FOOTER: These items are not tradable and will be applied when bought
INTRO_TOO_LONG: {{author}} Your introduction message can only be **90** characters long
SET_INTRO_CONFIRM:
Are you sure you want to set the following text to be displayed on your profile?

> {{intro}}
SET_CARD_CONFIRM: You are about to set **{{card}}** as your display card
SET_BG_CONFIRM: You are about to buy the background **{{selectedbg}}** for **{{amount}}** {{emoji}}
CANNOT_FIND_ACH: {{user}} You don't have any achievements with the following IDs: {{ids}}
MAX_AWARDS_DISPLAY: {{author}} You can only display a maximum of **6** awards on your profile
SET_AWARDS_CONFIRM: You are about to display the following awards ({{awards}}) on your profile
PC_CHARACTER_NOT_FOUND: {{author}} Could not find any character with that name
